Option: msg:"OS-MOBILE Android User-Agent detected"; flow:established,to_server; http_header; content:"User-Agent|3A|"; content:"android",distance 0,fast_pattern,nocase; pcre:"/^User-Agent\x3a[^\r\n]*android/i"; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop,ruleset community; service:http; classtype:policy-violation; sid:25521; rev:4;
